form.name: form1
form.h1: Cleveland Heights-University Heights City School District

span.p: All CH-UH CSD schools will be closed until May 1 due to the COVID-19 outbreak.

div.h1: Cleveland Heights-University Heights City School District

span.span: This page will be updated with the latest information from the CH-UH City School District.
Enroll your incoming kindergartner or new student right from your computer.
The CH-UH City School District is one of 250 school districts in the U.S. and Canada honored by the College Board with placement on the 10th Annual AP® District Honor Roll.
Roxboro Middle School celebrated its reopening with a ribbon cutting in August 2019. The District's two middle schools underwent extensive renovations from 2017 to 2019.
Monticello Middle School celebrated its reopening with a ribbon cutting in August 2019. The District's two middle schools underwent extensive renovations from 2017 to 2019.
In March 2019, Heights High took first place on News Channel 5's Academic Challenge.

div.h3: CH-UH Mission: Our schools provide a challenging and engaging education to prepare all our students to become responsible citizens and succeed in college and career.
